kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=myssion, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Post Request
kw.msg: Keyword 'RequestsLibrary.Post Request' is deprecated. Please use `POST On Session` instead.

POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/ask path_url=/api/v1/ask headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.2', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '32'} body=b'{"request": "Where can I park?"}'

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.
kw.msg: ${res_body} = {"answer": "Limited street parking is available on Caroline street. Residents have a dedicated car park at 1 caroline st on level B, visitors may park in the lower ground car park. ", "tenantName": "U...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Limited street parking is available on Caroline street. Residents have a dedicated car park at 1 caroline st on level B, visitors may park in the lower ground car park.
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

errors.msg: Keyword 'RequestsLibrary.Post Request' is deprecated. Please use `POST On Session` instead.
